lead_paragraph: The conventional wisdom was that risky derivatives from a London unit brought down A.I.G. But a Delaware division was gambling as well.
snippet: The conventional wisdom was that risky derivatives from a London unit brought down A.I.G. But a Delaware division was gambling as well.

headline.main: Risky Trading Wasn’t Just on the Fringe at A.I.G.
headline.seo: A.I.G. Insurance Unit Alico Dabbled in Credit-Default Swaps
headline.print_headline: Risky Trading Wasn’t Just on the Fringe at A.I.G.
